definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: chop meat; Palm. [[קחבא]] butcher, so Syr. qas.bo0, J Aram. [[קַצָּכָא]], and Ar. qas.=a0bun as loan-word Frä:258; Ar. qad.aba also is cut off a branch);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִקְחָכעֵ־ץ]] 2Ki 6:6 he cut off a stick; Pt. pass. fpl. [[עֵדֶר הַקְּחוּבוֹת]] Ct So 4:2 a flock of (sheep) that are shorn (?).
